Uses of Class
thothbot.parallax.core.client.gl2.WebGLFramebuffer

  • Packages that use WebGLFramebuffer 
    Package Description
    thothbot.parallax.core.client.gl2
    Here are located all WebGL rendering context related code.
    thothbot.parallax.core.client.textures
    Here are textures which can be used by Materials.

    • Uses of WebGLFramebuffer in thothbot.parallax.core.client.gl2

      Methods in thothbot.parallax.core.client.gl2 that return WebGLFramebuffer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WebGLFramebuffer WebGLRenderingContext.createFramebuffer()
      Create a WebGLFramebuffer object and initialize it with a framebuffer object name as if by calling glGenFramebuffers.
      Methods in thothbot.parallax.core.client.gl2 with parameters of type WebGLFramebuffer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void WebGLRenderingContext.bindFramebuffer(WebGLFramebuffer buffer)
      Bind a named framebuffer object.
      void WebGLRenderingContext.deleteFramebuffer(WebGLFramebuffer buffer)
      Delete the framebuffer object contained in the passed WebGLFramebuffer as if by calling glDeleteFramebuffers.
